html:
Feb 16 (Reuters) -

  • VISA IS PLEASED TO HAVE REACHED A BROAD, GLOBAL AGREEMENT WITH AMAZON - VISA SPOKESPERSON

  • AGREEMENT INCLUDES THE ACCEPTANCE OF VISA AT ALL AMAZON STORES AND SITES TODAY - VISA SPOKESPERSON

  • AGREEMENT WITH AMAZON INCLUDES JOINT COMMITMENT TO COLLABORATION ON NEW PRODUCT AND TECHNOLOGY INITIATIVES - VISA SPOKESPERSON


Further company coverage: V.N
